templates.name: Status Dot
templates.description: Simple filled status dot that changes color based on value thresholds.
templates.preview_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='30' fill='%230EA5E9'/></svg>

parameters.name: measure_name
parameters.description: Name for the new SVG measure

templates.name: Status Dot Outline
templates.description: Outlined status dot with hollow center. Lighter visual impact than filled.
templates.preview_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='30' fill='none' stroke='%230EA5E9' stroke-width='6'/></svg>

parameters.name: measure_name
parameters.description: Name for the new SVG measure

templates.name: Status Dot with Glow
templates.description: Status dot with a glowing effect for emphasis.
templates.preview_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='35' fill='%2316A34A' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='25' fill='%2316A34A'/></svg>

parameters.name: measure_name
parameters.description: Name for the new SVG measure
